title: Definition of AND
text: Although this doesn't say AND, we note that we want a student who is male with short hair, which we can rewrite as a male student and a student with short hair. Knowing that we're determining the probability of one event occuring AND another occuring, we can use AND symbolically.

title: Determining Given Probability
text: What is the probability then, that a student is male AND has short hair? We know how to represent both these events symbolically using letters.
